title: Create pitch deck (6 slides)
description:
Hackathon pitch presentation.

## Slides

1. **Problem** (30s)
   - $198B hidden tax on ecommerce
   - 56% of ads never seen by humans
   - 48 hours to detect critical errors

2. **Insight** (30s)
   - Marketing teams make suboptimal decisions
   - Data fragmented, analysis slow, opportunities missed

3. **Demo** (2 min)
   - Live or video demonstration
   - Key moment: "$152k found in 60 seconds"

4. **Tech** (30s)
   - Multi-agent architecture
   - Google ADK + FastAPI + Next.js
   - Real Meta API integration

5. **Value** (30s)
   - $X waste prevented
   - $Y scaled into winners
   - 80%+ recommendation accuracy target

6. **Next** (30s)
   - Real-time monitoring
   - Google Ads integration
   - AI-generated creative suggestions
